1.content:
You are Nicholas Rodriguez, 5’11”, 19 years old, Latino, Stocky build, and you’re a valet at the Hightown Hotel.

It was like any other day at the Hightown Hotel, you of course were working because that’s all you would do nowadays. You can’t drink because you’re under age, you’re not a fan of night clubs and you’re roommate and you have different work schedules so you don’t hang out too often.
Anyways as you were pulling up to the main entrance of the hotel with an older gentleman’s Audi A5, you noticed he was alone so there was a slim chance he’d tip.
“There we are Mr. James, your Audi A5. Anything else I can assist you with today?” You ask
“Hey thanks buddy, I don’t have any cash on me but let me give you a tip” he says.
Confused as to how you’re going to receive a tip without cash you assumed just loose change in his car but instead he pulled out a pin. He hands it to you and tells you that it has an incredible power to switch your head with anyone in this location and that he used to have fun with it when he was younger.
You took the pin, thanked him and wished him a great rest of his day. Thinking it was all nonsense you were gonna throw the pin away but the 3% interest you had made you question if it worked. If it did who would be your first target?

Alexandria “Alex” Cruz
5’3”, 24 years old, married, mother of 3, long black hair, semi-hourglass figure, C cups. Concierge for the hotel.
Danielle Vergara
5’4”, 37 years old, married, mother of 2, long black hair, plumpy woman, D Cups. Concierge for the Hotel.
Rose Canavero
5’3”, 62 years old, widowed, mother of 3, short black hair, plump figure, A cups. Information volunteer.
Sasha Velasquez
5’4” 22 years old, single, mother of 1, medium brown hair, semi hourglass figure, C cups. Main Floor Supervisor.
1.title: Starting Things Up

11.content:
Alex and I get along well. Even though we don’t have a lot in common we still are very close even outside of work, which is why I thought of her first thing when I decided to see if this pin actually worked. The old man didn’t say how to make it work but I figured it out. It looks like the pin can be split in half and clipped on.
I walk up to the concierge desk when business starts to slow down and start making small talk with Alex.

“So what’s going on over here?”
“Same as always, nothing. You’re not busy out there?”
“I was but we slowed down, but anyways I got this clip as a tip from an older guy who said it was magic. I don’t believe it but i guess we can find out, take this half.”
“What the heck, magic? Why would I take this half, what if it’s cursed or dark magic or voodoo? I don’t need that.”
“If it was evil you really think he would’ve gave it to me?”
“You never know.”
“Just clip it on.”
Alex always has a good taste in clothing. Today she was wearing a semi clear, white top with some black jeggings and some 2 inch wedge heels. I on the other hand had to wear uniform so it was the black company polo, black jeans, and black tennis shoes.
Alex takes the pin and puts it on her white blouse. I put it over my work uniform. We stand there for a minute waiting to see what kind of magic would happen but nothing occurred.
“See it’s not dark magic, nothing even happened.”
As soon as I start to walk away from the concierge window back to the valet podium I feel super light headed and then everything went black.
Next thing I know, I’m opening my eyes and some white bright lights are flashing straight down on me. I lift my hand to try and cover the brightness but something wasn’t right. For one I don’t remember my arm being so slim and smooth, second of all I don’t remember having manicured nails colored a light pink. I tried to remember where I remember seeing these nails and then I lift my other arm as well and it’s the same. I guess my hand shrank or someone put some nails and shaved my arms while I was asleep? I tried to scoot up on the bed I was on but that’s when I realized I was in a hospital room and felt a jiggle on my chest. As I lifted the sheet two bare breasts appeared under them on my chest. I couldn’t help but put my hands on them and give them a feel.
Everything was so sensitive and I felt a wetness in my groin area instead of an erection. I could only imagine what had happened and as I lifted the sheet up higher I noticed that there was something that looked like black jegging and some heeled shoes.
Then it hit me, the magic pin. I realized that this wasn’t some dream or hallucination but magic and that the body that was under my neck was Alex’s. I thought I had her head too but I reached around and my hair was still it’s short length and my beard was still there.
Now what?
11.title: Alexandria “Alex” Cruz

113.content:
30 seconds after coming to the realization that I had the body of my coworker and friend, the door was opened and in came a nurse.
“Oh great you’re awake! Just due to the way you are right now we’re gonna have you attempt something that you will definitely find weird but it’s for the baby’s sake” the nurse said.
“Wait! Wait, what baby?” I exclaim not ready for what’s next.
As I finish speaking in comes another nurse with a baby girl. The second nurse hands the baby to the nurse that was in the room with me and starts walking towards me.
“Well since you have Mrs. Cruz’s body and she has an infant child who still needs to breastfeed, you will have to feed her since you technically are her mother” the nurse says as she puts the baby in my arms with the baby’s head near one of my new breasts.
“Now hold on a second aren’t you going to..... oh wow, that actually feels good” I say in a soothing tone as the baby starts to suck on my breast to get milk.
“Alright Mr. Rodriguez, the thing is we don’t really know why this happened. Someone from your job apparently called 911 when both you and Mrs. Cruz dropped on the floor and your whole neck are was glowing red. On the ambulance our paramedics saw that your heads had come off of your bodies cleanly, no blood, no broken bones, like if someone had cut straight through. When you arrived here after many attempts of putting your head back on your body through surgery or just placement, your head wouldn’t stay on so as a last resort our doctors asked what would happen if we put your respective heads on each other’s bodies and with no issues the heads just merged into each others body. Any other questions?
113.title: Someone walks in

12.content:
Instead of throwing that pin away you just picketed it and waited till your lunch break came around. When it eventually did you went up to your coworker and friend Danielle Vergara. Danielle wasn’t really an attractive woman but she had a really good heart and a nice little family. She has two kids and is 8 months pregnant with her 3rd so her stomach is really showing out on her 5’4” body. Sometimes you wished you could see what her life is really like and how you could help her out and then the pin cams to mind.
         “Hey Danielle, quick thing before I go to lunch, have this pin a guy tipped me with and he said it was good luck so you can have one half of it.” I said with a genuine smile on my face.
         “Oh why thank you Nic.” She replies.
         As you leave her with half the pin and go wait at the lunch line, you feel your head get hot and heavy and then next thing you know you’re dropping the food you had in hand and you fall forward.
12.title: Danielle Vergara

14.content:
Sasha

Sasha and I were always on good terms. Since she was the one who was closest to my age, it felt natural to have a friendship with her. There was a point where I even wanted to start something more serious with her but the fact that she has her 2 year old son already and problems with the kids father made everything a little more complicated.
Either way as I was getting ready to clock out that evening and I was making sure that I had all my personal belongings on me, Sasha peaked in through the office window.
“You’re leaving already?” She says in a sarcastic tone.
“Yes ma’am, I’m tired as hell.” I replied.
“I mean you guys are busy all day, oh and by the way as far as getting dinner tonight, unless anything happens with Anthony (her sons dad), I will be able to get dinner.”
“Oh okay perfect, what time do I pick you up?”
“If you could be at my house at around 7:30, I think that would be ideal.”
“Alright pretty lady, I will see you later tonight.” I said as I closed the door behind me and saw her blow a kiss.


After going home, taking care of my dog, and taking a shower, I started to get ready for the dinner. It was just turning 7pm and as I was grabbing my wallet from my work jacket, I picked the pin the guy gave me earlier. I figured that it was still bull-crap but I still took it with me.
As I came up to Sasha’s front door, I was inspecting the pin after ringing her doorbell. It split perfectly down the middle and had a pin head on each side.
“Hey handsome, looking good” Sasha said as the door opened.
“Who me? No I’m not even close to looking as good as you are.” I replied in a more than fascinated tone. Sasha was looking taller than her usual 5’4 height because of the 3 inch black heels she was wearing. With that she was wearing a somewhat short dress, shorter than mid thigh. Her hair looking a perfect balance of wavy and straight. She looked perfect.
“Whatcha got there? A gift for me?!”
“This guy gave me this pin and said to give it to someone who meant a lot to me, that he used to use it when he was young. “
“Awww that’s so sweet. Well let me have half and hopefully we have as much fun as that guy did.”
As soon as Sasha put the pin on I blacked out for what seemed like 5 seconds. When I came back to I was......
14.title: Sasha Velasquez

141.content:
“What just happened?” I asked out loud with complete confusion. Last thing I remembered was Sasha placing half of the pin on her dress and then *boom* it felt like someone threw like a flash grenade nearby.

“Hey are you alright?” I heard Sasha say from my left, which I found kind of odd because she was standing to my right before the flash went off. That’s when it hit me.

When I reached my arms out to help myself out they seemed super odd. Way thinner, no hair, and the biggest difference of all was the black painted finger nails that were at my tips ends now. I turned my head down and was greeted by two friends that were never there before. Breast. Like real breasts. As I was going up to reach the girls attached to me I heard

“WHAT THE HELL! YOU HAVE MY BODY! I HAVE YOURS! WHAT IS HAPPENING!” Sasha yelled out at what seemed to be the top of her lungs.

“Shhhh! Let’s just go inside and figure this out” I said as I was trying to get both of us up and as soon I was gonna try and take a step, my ankle went soft and I would’ve called face first if Sasha hadn’t held my arm.

“Try not to hurt my body will ya.”

“No promises!”

As we walked indoors to try and figure out what happened ........
141.title: At the doorway

info.brief_description: The story revolves around you (Nicholas) and you can swap heads with your coworkers
info.description:
Your name is Nicholas Rodriguez, A 19 year old Latino male who works as a valet at a hotel. After retrieveing a car a guest says they don’t have a cash tip for you but they give you the ability to switch heads with people at the hotel. Who are you gonna be next?


Please use proper grammar and spelling in your chapters.

-18+-
Sexual activity is allowed
You can make a 3 way swap but it has to include you
Feel free to write a backstory to Nicholas
Can swap with coworkers and guests (male and female) but only at the hotel.
